data.text:
This is a list of the fastest-selling video games. The definition of "fastest-selling" typically refers to sales results in the first week of a product's release, (i.e., which product had the biggest launch). Sometimes, rather than comparing sales figures relative to time, the target to be reached is fixed (e.g. sales at 5 million units), and the comparison is based upon how many weeks it takes to reach it (e.g. 52 weeks vs. 56 weeks).

Video games by platform[]

Nintendo game consoles

2023 (Switch) - The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom sold 10 million in 3 days, matching the previous record.[55].

2022 (Switch) - Pokémon Scarlet and Violet sold 10 million in 3 days, making it the fastest-selling Nintendo game[293]

2021 (Switch) - Monster Hunter Rise sold 4 million copies in three days,[294] and 5 million in one week.[124]

2020 (Switch) - Animal Crossing: New Horizons sold 13.41 million copies in its first 6 weeks, with 11.77 million selling in the first 11 days.[295][296]

2019 (Switch) – Pokémon Sword and Shield sold 6 million copies worldwide (physical and digital) during their launch weekend, and are among the fastest-selling Nintendo Switch games of all time.[297]

2018 (Switch) – Super Smash Bros. Ultimate sold 5 million units within its first week,[298] is the fastest-selling Nintendo game of all time[299] and has an all-time high record for launch-month dollars sales for a console exclusive (12 million units sold in 3 weeks).[300][301]

2017 (Switch) – Mario Kart 8 Deluxe is considered the fastest selling game in Mario Kart's franchise history with over 1.0 million units sold in its first 3 days (459,000 units in USA in 2 days).[302]

2017 (Switch) – Super Mario Odyssey shipped 2 million units in three days.[303]

2017 (Switch and Wii U) – The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is considered Nintendo's fastest selling launch title of all time with 1.3 Million units sold in US alone in its first month (925,000 units on Switch and 460,000 units on Wii U).[304]

2013 (Nintendo 3DS) – Pokémon X and Y selling 4 million units in two days.[305]

PlayStation home consoles

2023 (Playstation 5) - Marvel's Spider-Man 2 sold 2.5 million within its first 24 hours, 5 million in 2 weeks[77].

2023 (PlayStation 5) – Final Fantasy XVI sold 3 million units within its first week.[306]

2022 (Playstation 4 and Playstation 5) - God of War: Ragnarok sold 5.1 million in 5 days

2018 (PlayStation 4 and Xbox One) – Red Dead Redemption 2 shipped 10 million units within its first two days.[307]

2018 (PlayStation 4 and Xbox One) – Monster Hunter: World shipped 5 million units in its first three days.[308]

2016 (PlayStation 4) – Final Fantasy XV shipped 5 million units on its first day.[309]
